author: Syed Wajeeh Naqvi 🍁
text:
All praise be to Allah
Who gives answer to me whenever I call,
covers my shortcomings,yet I disobey,
gives me largest part of bounties, yet I don't show gratitude.
Many a terrible danger had He turned off,
& many a blossoming joy 'd He made available for me.

~Dua e iftitah 
🙏🏻💔 https://t.co/k0M4DeqAXk

author: Syed Wajeeh Naqvi 🍁
text:
Ibn Abbas reported Holy Prophet s.a.w.w said:
“The Best of women among the people of Paradise are Khadija bint Khuwaylid s.a, Fatimah bint Muhammad s.a , Maryam bint ‘Imran s.a, & ‘Asiyah bint Muzahim s.a , the wife of Pharaoh.”

Source: Musnad Aḥmad 2896

text:
“Their fields, their crops, their streams,
Even the peasant in the vale,
They sold, they sold all alas,
How cheap was the sale.”
~Allama Iqbal

#16March1846
#TreatyOfAmritsar
#KashmirSeeksAttention
#KashmirBlackDay https://t.co/Pph4fxbXX0

author: Syed Wajeeh Naqvi 🍁
text:
This wasn't an ordinary event in the history of Kashmir & to this date a mention of the treaty evokes emotional response as it reminds them of the violation of dignity.Whatever may be the case but Kashmiris became first hand victims of the foul play of Dogra-British regimes.
🍁🏴

author: Syed Wajeeh Naqvi 🍁
text:
The treaty was formalised by the British colonial Empire.
In this so-called ‘treaty’ (of Amritsar) the sale deed was not only made of some area of 84,471 sq. miles but this was more a wholesale bargain of around two million Kashmiris with their hopes and dreams altogether.

author: Syed Wajeeh Naqvi 🍁
text:
16th March 1846
A ghostlike day for entire #Kashmiris when an infamous bargain was materialised & subsequently a nation was sold for seventy five lakh (nanak shahi rupees) to Raja Gulab Singh.
🏴🍁

#TreatyOfAmritsar
